entries.title: Banque de France Annual Report 2024 – Key figures
entries.text: GDP growth in France stood at 1.1% in 2024. It is expected to be a little lower in 2025 at 0.7%, but to pick up more sharply in 2026 and 2027.

entries.title: National Cash Management Policy - Banque de France
entries.text: The Banque de France's cash management activities are based on a dual principle of neutrality and freedom of choice of means of payment.

entries.title: Monetary policy collateral | Banque de France
entries.text: Monetary policy collateral refers to the guarantees that banks provide to the Banque de France in return for the liquidity it provides.
